forecastday.title: Saturday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Mostly cloudy. Periods of rain this morning. High 13C. Winds NW at 25 to 40 km/h. Chance of rain 90%.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain ending this morning. Then remaining mainly cloudy. High near 55F. Winds NW at 15 to 25 mph. Chance of rain 90%.

forecastday.title: Saturday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy skies during the evening giving way to a few showers after midnight. Low 8C. Winds N at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 40%.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy skies during the evening giving way to a few showers after midnight. Low 47F. NW winds shifting to ENE at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 40%.

forecastday.title: Sunday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain showers in the morning will evolve into a more steady rain in the afternoon. High 13C. Winds SE at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall near 12mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain showers in the morning will evolve into a more steady rain in the afternoon. High around 55F. Winds SE at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall around a half an inch.

forecastday.title: Sunday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Periods of rain. Becoming windy late. Low 12C. SE winds at 15 to 25 km/h, increasing to 30 to 50 km/h. Chance of rain 100%. 25 to 50mm of rain expected.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain. Becoming windy late. Low 53F. SE winds at 10 to 15 mph, increasing to 20 to 30 mph. Chance of rain 100%. 1 to 2 inches of rain expected.

forecastday.title: Monday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy and windy with periods of rain. Potential for heavy rainfall. High 16C. Winds S at 40 to 55 km/h. Chance of rain 100%. 25 to 50mm of rain expected.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy and windy with periods of rain. Potential for heavy rainfall. High 59F. Winds S at 25 to 35 mph. Chance of rain 100%. 1 to 2 inches of rain expected.

forecastday.title: Monday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy and windy at times with periods of rain. Low 12C. Winds SSW at 30 to 50 km/h. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall near 12mm. Winds could occasionally gust over 65 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Windy at times with rain. Low 53F. Winds SSW at 20 to 30 mph. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall around a half an inch. Winds could occasionally gust over 40 mph.

forecastday.title: Tuesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with showers. High around 15C. Winds SSW at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of rain 60%.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with showers. High 58F. Winds SSW at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 60%.

forecastday.title: Tuesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain showers early with mostly cloudy conditions late. Low 9C. Winds W at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 60%.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain showers early with mostly cloudy conditions late. Low 48F. Winds W at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 60%.

forecastday.title: Wednesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy skies. High 13C. Winds WNW at 15 to 30 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Intervals of clouds and sunshine. High 54F. Winds WNW at 10 to 20 mph.

forecastday.title: Wednesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Clear skies. Low 6C. Winds NNW at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Clear skies. Low 43F. Winds NNW at 10 to 15 mph.

forecastday.title: Thursday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Sunny skies. High near 15C. Winds NW at 15 to 25 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Sunny skies. High 58F. Winds NW at 10 to 15 mph.

forecastday.title: Thursday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Clear skies early then becoming mostly cloudy later at night. Low 6C. Winds NNE at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Clear evening skies will give way to mostly cloudy skies overnight. Low 42F. Winds NNE at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Friday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy skies. High 14C. Winds SW at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Some clouds in the morning will give way to mainly sunny skies for the afternoon. High 57F. SSE winds shifting to W at 10 to 15 mph.

forecastday.title: Friday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: A mostly clear sky. Low 7C. Winds NE at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: A mostly clear sky. Low 44F. Winds NE at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Saturday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Abundant sunshine. High 14C. Winds NNW at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Abundant sunshine. High 57F. Winds NNW at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Saturday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Clear. Low 7C. Winds NE at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Clear. Low 44F. Winds NE at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Sunday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Sunny, along with a few afternoon clouds. High 14C. Winds WNW at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Generally sunny despite a few afternoon clouds. High 57F. Winds WNW at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Sunday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy skies in the evening, then becoming cloudy overnight. Low 8C. Winds NNW at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy skies in the evening, then becoming cloudy overnight. Low near 45F. Winds NNW at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy skies early, followed by partial clearing. High 54F. Winds W at 10 to 15 mph.
